text: {{Infobox Settlement |name =Fátima |official_name = |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = |total_type = |motto = |image_skyline = Fátima, Portugal.jpg |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = |image_flag = Flag of Fatima.svg |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = Coat of Arms Fatima.svg |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_caption = |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map =Portugal |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption =Location within Portugal |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Portugal |subdivision_type1 = District |subdivision_name1 = Santarém |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = Ourém |subdivision_type3 = Parishes |subdivision_name3 = 1 |seat_type = |seat = |parts_type = |parts_style = |parts = |p1 = |p2 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 =71.29 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |elevation_max_m = |elevation_max_ft = |elevation_min_m = |elevation_min_ft = |population_as_of =2001 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total =10302 |population_density_km2 =144 |population_density_sq_mi = |timezone = GMT |utc_offset = 0 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coor_type = |coordinates = |postal_code_type = Postal code |postal_code = 2495 |area_code = |website = http://www.freguesiadefatima.pt |footnotes = }} Fátima () is a city in Portugal. It is famous for the religious visions that took place there in 1917. The town itself has a population of 10,302 (2001). It is in the municipality of Ourém, in the Centro Region and sub region of Medio Tejo. It is in the district of Santarém and included in the urban agglomeration of Leiria, in central Portugal, south of Porto and north of Lisbon. ==Related pages== * Our Lady of Fatima ==Other websites== * Sanctuary of Fátima * Pilgrims of Fátima Category:Cities in Portugal Category:Santarém District
title: Fátima, Portugal
